title: AppHarvest President on Going Public Via SPAC
itunes:title: AppHarvest President on Going Public Via SPAC
description:
David Lee, President of AppHarvest, discusses his indoor farming venture going public via SPAC. He points out the urgency of finding long term partners and access capital to scale business.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
